original_text: I’m disappointed with how my support ticket was handled. It’s been a week and no one has responded.
response_4_1: I’m feeling quite disappointed as I haven’t received a response to my support ticket, even though it’s been a week since I reached out.
response_mini:
Subject: Concern Regarding Support Ticket Response

Dear [Support Team/Recipient's Name],

I hope this message finds you well. I wanted to express my disappointment regarding the handling of my support ticket. It’s been a week, and I haven't received any response yet. I understand that things can get busy, but I would greatly appreciate any updates you could provide.

Thank you for your attention to this matter.

Best regards,  
[Your Name]

Dear [Recipient's Name],

We're delighted to extend our heartfelt invitation to you for our winter gallery opening on December 5. It would mean so much to us to have you join us for this special occasion. If you could kindly RSVP by November 20, we would greatly appreciate it.

Looking forward to celebrating together!

Warm regards,  
[Your Name]  
[Your Position]  
[Your Organization]
